titles.title: Respect for Hispanic Americans Act
Respect for Hispanic Americans Act
A bill to prohibit agencies from using the term "Latinx" in official communications or forms.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Respect for Hispanic Americans Act
This bill prohibits federal agencies from using the term Latinx in any official communication or form.
